attributes.additional_details:
legalize Recreational weed 
Would Provide a new Thriving Industry to the u.k 
Bring in More tourism - provide 1000s of jobs - Tax  raised to go towards NHS and Not raising People's Taxes - Would Provide cleaner safer product for people - It would Severely affect  Organized Crime (in a negative way)  - Tax reasons alone Extra £100m per year! - 
you can still have laws in place no smoking in streets etc and people will happily abide by these rules. 
This is win win for people and Govt..
